Module com.group09.playit
Package com.group09.playit.state

Class RoundState

java.lang.Object
com.group09.playit.state.RoundState
public class RoundState extends Object
The class Round state. It is used to store the state of a round and to create a new round from a given state. It stores the player names, the player hands, the played cards and the winning player ids.
